### Ariel Canadian Cryoharness Contribution

**Contract Notice #**: WS4046062724-Doc4218728255

**Publication Date**: 2023-09-19

**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-04T14:00:00

### Notice Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has posted a Request for Proposal for a contract with the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) for flight-quality **cryogenic cable harnesses** to be installed in the Ariel spacecraft as part of the CSA’s Ariel Cryoharness project.

### Tender Description

This contract requires the provision of high-qualify cable harnesses designed for -200°C operating temperatures, scalable for up to 5 additional units. The cables will be installed in the Ariel spacecraft and adhere to the stringent technical requirements of the Aircraft Industry Process (RTCA DO-160G). The scope encompasses the design, manufacture, and integration of the cable harnesses. The successful bidder will be expected to meet the stringent quality requirements of the Canadian Aerospace and Defence NTS-006 standards.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection process is based on the **highest technical merit within a stipulated maximum budget**. The contracting entity will evaluate proposals based on relevant expertise, management systems, and past experience.

### Terms and Conditions

* Amendment Number: 0
* Discretionary Closing Time: 2023-10-04T14:00:00

### Contact Information

* Amélie Beaulieu
* Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* amelie.beaulieu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
